name: Intruders: Hide and Seek
description:
Intruders is a stealth VR experience where we embody Ben, a 13 year old boy on the worst night of his life ...

Imagine you are a child enjoying a few days with your family in your country house. Suddenly, three intruders burst into the house and kidnap your entire family. They do not know that you are inside and you have very little time to help your loved ones. To do this, you must move unnoticed by the house, trying to survive your worst nightmare come true.

In 2016, Intruders: Hide and Seek won the Fun & Serious award for being the Best University Project of the year, the Press Award in the PlayStation Talents and in addition, the PlayStation Talents Award for Best Video Game of the year.

Are you ready to live it?
